channel.title: CRIB Configuration on CRIB artemis
channel.description: Recent content in CRIB Configuration on CRIB artemis

item.title: Analysis environment
item.description: last modified: 2023-12-12 by Kodai Okawa CRIB shares the analysis environment of all experiments under one user account (username crib).

item.title: Online-mode analysis
item.description: last modified: 2023-12-12 by Kodai Okawa We often use “nssta” (non-save mode start) analysis in the beam tuning.

item.title: User config
item.description: last modified: 2023-12-12 by Kodai Okawa Warning still under consideration in this part!

item.title: New commands
item.description: last modified: 2023-12-12 by Kodai Okawa Various commands (mainly the same with ANAPAW commands) have been developed for CRIB experiment.

item.title: Minor changes
item.description: last modified: 2023-12-13 by Kodai Okawa thisartemis.sh.in Grammar issue I think.
